name: GWPKit
summary: 一个简单的组件库，包括GWPSliderViewController、GWPGIFView、GWPLog、GWPBaseCellModel、GWPUnderlineSegmentedControl、GWPBadge、判断设备屏幕的种类、封装MBProgressHUD
description: 这是一个简单的组件库，包括GWPSliderViewController、GWPGIFView、GWPLog、GWPBaseCellModel、GWPUnderlineSegmentedControl、GWPBadge、判断设备屏幕的种类、封装MBProgressHUD
